text: usane kaha, "main chaahata hoon ki apanee in donon betiyon mein se ek ka vivaah tumhaare saath is shart par kar doon ki tum aath varsh tak mere yahaan naukaree karo. aur yadi tum das varsh poore kar do, to yah tumhaaree or se hoga. main tumhen kathinaee mein daalana nahin chaahata. yadi allaah ne chaaha to tum mujhe nek paoge.
